title: DUNKMASTER THEME
body:
Can we get an mp3, or sound file of some sort, of Darius' epic dunking theme used in the Dunkmaster video?
[](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wdGvCuikMZQ)

replies.body: Thank you, I can't wait to hear the full anthem of the lord of dunk.
I've been refreshing the soundcloud since the video came out hoping this would get uploaded, +1
With Worlds having officially come to a close, is there any semblance of an estimated time of arrival in which I could expect to hear the anthem of dunk.
Posting here just to remind Riot Eno about looking into it.
